[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@nextgis/ngw-map](./ngw-map.md) &gt; [NgwMap](./ngw-map.ngwmap.md) &gt; [addNgwLayer](./ngw-map.ngwmap.addngwlayer.md)

## NgwMap.addNgwLayer() method

Add any (style, vector, webmap) NGW layer by resource definition.

**Signature:**

```typescript
addNgwLayer(options: NgwLayerOptions): Promise<ResourceAdapter | undefined>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | NgwLayerOptions | set layer identification parameters and render method. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;ResourceAdapter \| undefined&gt;

## Example


```javascript
// Add raster layer resourceId is the style of 4004 layer
ngwMap.addNgwLayer({ resource: 4005 });
// Add vector data from layer GEOJSON source
ngwMap.addNgwLayer({
  resource: 4038,
  adapter: 'GEOJSON',
  adapterOptions: { paint: { color: 'red' } }
});
```
